synonyms.synonym: Nuclear receptor subfamily 1 group I member 1

protein.general_function: Involved in sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity
protein.specific_function: Nuclear hormone receptor. Transcription factor that mediates the action of vitamin D3 by controlling the expression of hormone sensitive genes. Regulates transcription of hormone sensitive genes via its association with the WINAC complex, a chromatin-remodeling complex. Recruited to promoters via its interaction with the WINAC complex subunit BAZ1B/WSTF, which mediates the interaction with acetylated histones, an essential step for VDR-promoter association. Plays a central role in calcium homeostasis

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity
